subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig recalled A. Bartlett Giamatti, the former commissioner who died of a heart attack eight days after banning Pete Rose from baseball in 1989.
snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig recalled A. Bartlett Giamatti, the former commissioner who died of a heart attack eight days after banning Pete Rose from baseball in 1989.
